name: Text Field - Solid
description: A text input with a solid border

allowFontScaling.label: Allow Font Scaling
allowFontScaling.description: Whether fonts should scale to respect Text Size in the user's accessibility settings. (Default: true)

autoCapitalize.label: Auto Capitalize
autoCapitalize.description: Can automatically capitalize sentences, words, and characters (Default: none).

autoFocus.label: Auto Focus
autoFocus.description: Focuses the input on load in and brings up the keyboard

caretHidden.label: Hide Caret
caretHidden.description: Hides the caret(the line small line underneath each showing where you're editing/typing

contextMenuHidden.label: Hide Context Menu
contextMenuHidden.description: Hides the system context menu (Default: false)

defaultValue.label: Default Value
defaultValue.description: The value that of the text-input initially, not a placeholder but the value that the textInput is taking in.

editable.label: Editable
editable.description: If false, the text is not editable

keyboardAppearance.label: Keyboard Appearance
keyboardAppearance.description: Determines the color of the keyboard.(iOS Only)

keyboardType.label: Keyboard Type
keyboardType.description: Determines what keyboard is given to the user.

maxLength.label: Max Length
maxLength.description: Limits the input to a set number of characters.

placeholder.label: Placeholder Text
placeholder.description: The text that is shown on load when no value is available.

placeholderTextColor.label: Placeholder Text Color
placeholderTextColor.description: The color of the placeholder text.

returnKeyLabel.label: Return Key Label
returnKeyLabel.description: (Android Only) Sets the label on the return key (use this instead of rewturnKeyType)

returnKeyType.label: Return Key Type
returnKeyType.description: Determines how the return key should look like

secureTextEntry.label: Password field
secureTextEntry.description: If true, this turns the field into a password field, hiding the text

selectionColor.label: Selection Color
selectionColor.description: Color of the highlighted portion when selecting.

selectTextOnFocus.label: Select Text on Focus
selectTextOnFocus.description: If true, all the text will automatically be selected on focus

label.label: Label
label.description: The label to be displayed on the text field

assistiveText.label: Assistive text
assistiveText.description: Helper text to display below the input

disabled.label: Disabled
disabled.description: Whether the input should be disabled. Will prevent input and show a greyed out state.

error.label: Error
error.description: Whether the input should display the error state

leftIconName.label: Left icon name
leftIconName.description: The icon to display on the left

leftIconMode.label: Left icon mode
leftIconMode.description: The mode of the icon to display on the left. 'inset' or 'outset'.

rightIconName.label: Right icon name
rightIconName.description: The icon to display on the right

fieldName.label: Field name
fieldName.description: The name of the field within the screen that will store this component's value
